keyMoments.title: Learns Blackbeard Captured Ace
keyMoments.description: Luffy learns from Blackbeard that he was the one who captured Ace and turned him over to the World Government, explaining the cause of Ace's impending execution.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation fuels Luffy's rage and establishes Blackbeard as the direct cause of Ace's predicament, intensifying their rivalry.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Blackbeard with Gear Second
keyMoments.description: Enraged, Luffy activates Gear Second and punches Blackbeard with tremendous force, sending him flying into a wall.
keyMoments.significance: First direct combat between Luffy and his eventual rival for Pirate King.

keyMoments.title: Experiences Blackbeard's Devil Fruit Nullification
keyMoments.description: Luffy is pulled in by Blackbeard's Kurouzu and slammed into the ground, bleeding from his mouth as his rubber powers are nullified.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy experiences for the first time a power that can completely negate his Devil Fruit abilities.

keyMoments.title: Chooses Saving Ace Over Revenge
keyMoments.description: After Jinbe intervenes and reminds him of the time constraint, Luffy chooses to continue toward Ace rather than fight Blackbeard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's emotional maturity in prioritizing his brother's life over personal revenge.

keyMoments.title: Easily Defeats Revived Minotaurus
keyMoments.description: Luffy defeats the revived Minotaurus with a single attack, showing how much stronger he's become.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's power growth as he easily defeats an enemy that previously challenged him.

relationships.description: Luffy's hatred for Blackbeard intensifies after learning he captured Ace.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy learns Blackbeard captured Ace and attacks him in rage, establishing deep enmity.

name.japanese: マーシャル・D・ティーチ

keyMoments.title: Reveals He Captured Ace
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard reveals to Luffy that he captured Portgas D. Ace and turned him over to the World Government to become a Warlord.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Blackbeard as directly responsible for Ace's execution and the events leading to the Marineford War.
keyMoments.quote: It was me who captured Ace and turned him over to the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Uses Kurouzu on Luffy
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard uses his Yami Yami no Mi ability to pull Luffy in and slam him to the ground, nullifying his rubber powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the unique threat Blackbeard poses to Devil Fruit users with his nullification ability.

keyMoments.title: Confirms One Piece and Skypiea Exist
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard calls out to Luffy as he leaves, confirming that both the One Piece and Skypiea are real.
keyMoments.significance: Validates Luffy's dreams and adventures from a rival who also seeks the One Piece.
keyMoments.quote: The One Piece is real! Skypiea exists too!

keyMoments.title: Poisoned by Magellan
keyMoments.description: Magellan catches up to Blackbeard and his crew, poisoning all of them with his Doku Doku no Mi abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even as a new Warlord, Blackbeard is outmatched by Magellan's overwhelming poison powers.

abilities.description: Blackbeard uses gravitational pull from his darkness to draw enemies toward him, then slams them down with tremendous force while nullifying their Devil Fruit powers.

reveals.information: Blackbeard planned to capture Luffy at Water 7 to become a Warlord, but captured Ace instead

keyMoments.title: Stops Luffy from Fighting Blackbeard
keyMoments.description: Jinbe physically intervenes to stop Luffy from continuing his fight with Blackbeard, reminding him they must prioritize saving Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Jinbe serves as the voice of reason, keeping Luffy focused on the mission despite his emotional state.
keyMoments.quote: There's no time for that! We must save Ace!

keyMoments.title: Poisons Entire Blackbeard Pirates Crew
keyMoments.description: Magellan catches up to Blackbeard and uses his poison abilities to incapacitate the entire Blackbeard Pirates crew, including their captain.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Magellan's overwhelming power as he single-handedly defeats a Warlord and his entire crew.

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Defeats Sadi
keyMoments.description: Ivankov defeats Sadi, the Chief Guard of Impel Down, and ties her up with her own whip.
keyMoments.significance: Removes a key Impel Down guard, clearing the path for the prison break.

keyMoments.title: Reaches Impel Down Level 1
keyMoments.description: Buggy and Mr. 3 successfully reach Level 1 of Impel Down with a group of prisoners following them, getting closer to escape.
keyMoments.significance: Progresses the prison break as Buggy's group reaches the uppermost level of the prison.

keyMoments.title: Reaches Impel Down Level 1 with Buggy
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 and Buggy successfully reach Level 1 of Impel Down, leading a group of prisoners toward escape.
keyMoments.significance: Progress in the mass prison break as they near the exit.

keyMoments.title: Questions Blackbeard's Motives
keyMoments.description: Crocodile questions why Blackbeard would risk his Warlord position by attacking Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights the mystery of Blackbeard's true plans in infiltrating the prison.
